DataElement.preferredName: CARTOX-10 Point Neurological Assessment Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a CARTOX-10 point neurological assessment was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10.

Concepts.definition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to CAR T therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10.
Executed and carried through to completion.
